Description:
Ideal for a young family or first home buyer
In a quiet original pocket of Epping sits this proudly lived in 3 bedroom home with 2 bathrooms (including Master with ensuite), plus recent additions that makes it comfortable living. Situated in the heart of Epping only minutes away from all your local amenities such as St Monica's College, St Peters Primary, Epping Train Station, Pacific Epping Shopping Centre, Greenbrook shops and so much more!
Positioned on a great size of aproxx 613sqm, your new home is enriched with premium size land. Entertain friends and family all year round, with a well maintained and designed alfresco area plus plenty of space in the backyard. Housing a large single car garage plus a storage shed in the back, this home is perfect for any investor, first home buyer or a young family who’s trying to get their foot in the door of Epping’s booming real estate market.
Insights: 9 Merrill Drive, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2017 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality Living & Triple Car Garage
Built to last this quality home offers 4 great sized bedrooms of which two comprise both a walk in robe and ensuite, allowing flexibility to accommodate a growing family or visiting guests, an added central bathroom makes it three in total all of which include floor to ceiling porcelain tiles, tiled shower bases and high end fixtures and fittings. Quality kitchen with 60mm stone benchtops looking out to an open meals and living area soaked in natural light, enjoying views of the manicured gardens and timber decked outdoor living zone. Perfect for any boat owner, car enthusiast or tradie with a trailer full of tools! Secure your prized possessions with ease of access and flexibility with this rare triple car garage that allows drive through access.
With extras like refrigerated cooling, high ceilings, high garage door, porcelain tiles, ducted heating, custom designed driveway and much more, all set in the prestigious Lyndarum Estate Epping. Get this one on the inspection list.
Insights: 5 Argo Court, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2017 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Location - Land Approx 674m2
TWILIGHT AUCTION 30th November at 7pm ONSITE
Nestled in a quiet court location, yet perfectly positioned within minutes to Epping Train Station, Greenbrook Shopping Centre, Epping Plaza, a good choice of schools including St Monica's College, recreational parks, walking tracks and other amenities, is this immaculately presented family home ready to simply move in and enjoy.
Comprising 3 bedrooms plus study or 4th bedroom, 1 bathroom and 2 toilets, L shaped lounge, dining/meals area, well appointed timber kitchen with breakfast bar, gas standalone cooker, dishwasher and separate laundry.
Fully covered alfresco area is perfect for entertaining and relaxing all year round, surrounded by beautifully maintained gardens with fruit trees on huge allotment.
Features and highlights include hardwood polished floor boards, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, huge double garage, carport, plus so much more.
If you after, location, land and value, you can't go past this property
Genuine vendor with clear instructions to sell, so act quickly or miss out

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.

Description:
Executive Living at its best!
Located in the exclusive Hayston Estate, this instantly appealing residence provides impeccable style, low maintenance interiors and complete privacy.
This impressive Porter Davis home (built 2007) showcases 37sqs of luxury living at its absolute best on a generous land size of approx 638sqm. Perfect for entertaining and completing the home is the enclosed patio with fire place which offers the perfect all-year-round place to entertain and relax with friends and family! If that wasn't enough, located off the living area's you'll find a complete home theatre room which is just one of the 3 livings areas on offer - you'll be spoilt for space here! Including:
- 4 x huge bedrooms (main with lounge retreat and full ensuite + robes)
- Study / Home office / 5th bedroom conversion
-2 Bathrooms in total
- Stunning kitchen with 900mm stove and walk in butler's pantry
- Gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling
- Ducted Vacuuming
- 16 x professionally installed security cameras with recording equipment.
- Timber plantation shutters on all windows
- 20 x solar panels
- Stack stone feature wall entrance
- Double lock up garage with BOTH drive through and internal access
This one of a kind home sets the benchmark for luxurious living and is sure to impress! Make sure you take the time to inspect before its gone. All enquiries welcome.
* Photo ID required and all buyers must register their attendance prior with the agent *
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
767 High Street Epping
219 High Street Thomastown

Description:
Family living in a premium location
First home buyers, investors and families will be drawn to this solid residence set on 574sqm
of land in a quiet location, this beautifully presented home is the perfect opportunity to buy in
one of Epping's most sought after positions. On entry you will immediately appreciate the
abundance of space this home has to offer, enjoy the huge separate living area flooded with
an abundance of natural light.
The spacious kitchen with ample bench space and walk in pantry overlooks the adjoining meals area that leads out to the large back yard with huge pergola, open fire place and BBQ entertainment zone that can be used all year round. If entertaining is your thing then you need to look no further. The master bedroom offers a full ensuite and WIR and is complemented by two further bedrooms with BIR and a great size central bathroom. The home also offers space for the perfect home office, fourth bedroom or kids retreat.
Additional Features include ducted heating, air-conditioning, down lights throughout, quality
window furnishings, double lock up carport and laundry with external access. Close to
shops, public transport and in numerous school zones, this property is a must see, don't be
the one to miss out on this great opportunity.

Description:
Family Friendly Court Location
Nestled in a quiet court locale, this charming home offers an abundance of space for the growing family. Step into this property and be amazed as you are welcomed by the extra large lounge room with cathedral ceilings, fireplace and split system cooling, 3 excellent bedrooms (main with ensuite), bright central kitchen overlooking a spacious meals area and leading out to an entertainers delight that features a fantastic undercover entertainment area and wide side drive to double garage, all set on an excellent allotment of 557m2. Add to this ducted heating, garden sheds, sunblinds and landscaped gardens. Located less than 5 minutes drive to Plenty Valley Shopping Centre, South Morang train station, Meadow-Glen primary school, Mill Park Secondary College and beautiful parklands just moments away. A charming first home or superb investment, this lovely home is sure to please couples, young families and investors alike.

Description:
Sensational Family Living in a Prime Location
One of the area's premier streets provides the perfect setting for this captivating home that's sure to make an impression with its stylish kitchen,fabulous outdoor entertaining area and a theatre room. Set on a deep block of land, with a land area of approx 617sqm, the home's flawless interior comprises four generous bedrooms (BIRs) and two bathrooms, stone-top kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, light-filled open lounge/dining area and a separate lounge. Add to this ducted heating and evaporative cooling, polished hardwood floors, laundry, plus a backyard garden
Living at Lyndarum you will enjoy an enviable lifestyle with schools, kindergartens, parklands within walking distance, local shopping centres, cinemas, restaurants and the northern hospital all within easy reach. Only 26km approx north of the CBD with convenient access to the Hume Freeway and Ring Road, this is the perfect location.
Don't miss out on a once in a lifetime opportunity to purchase this stunning home. Enquire today.

Situated in a terrific location is this well maintained home close to all amenities. Quality-built Family Home
This first time on the market quality owner built home offers spacious living for the growing family comprising of 4 generous sized bedrooms with built in robes (Master with walk in robe & ensuite), study, timber kitchen with adjoining meals area, formal lounge, dining and rumpus room, three bathrooms in total, polished floorboards, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, ducted vacuum system, alarm, huge upstairs storage room, Italian crystal chandeliers, terracotta roof tiles, a large double garage with kitchenette and workshop, and outdoor alfresco area.
All set on a generous size allotment of 585m2 approx and is close to all amenities including transport, schools, Epping Plaza Shopping Centre, freeway and hospital.
A truly magnificent quality built home not to be missed. Inspections are a must!

Description:
The Perfect Start In The Perfect Position
This single level home on a generous allotment delivers a prime opportunity to purchase in a central, sought after pocket.
Adjacent to Winchester Avenue reserve with its playground equipment and acres of parklands that will please active kids and grateful parents alike, it provides easy living just a short walk from the pre-school, bus and Greenbrook Village.
Formal lounge, generous casual living over looked by the kitchen, main bedroom with ensuite and two remaining bedrooms served by the family bathroom, are complemented by a covered alfresco area providing plenty of space for outdoor entertaining.
With ducted heating and cooling, garage, timber floors, upgraded kitchen appliances and scope to add value as time goes on, this is a perfectly positioned, perfectly proportioned proposition.

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is
correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies.
Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
A WINNING CHOICE
Opportunity knocks for the first home buyer or astute investor. This well maintained family home is located in the heart of Epping, opposite parkland & only moments away from all amenities including Epping Pacific, Northern Hospital, schools, shops & public transport. Features 3 generous bedrooms, L shaped living room & well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Family bathroom, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, carport & generous back yard. There is plenty of scope to further enhance this inviting home & make it your own. An inspection is certain to impress.

Description:
The Complete Poolside Lifestyle Package
With a relaxing rear entertainment oasis complete with a poolside alfresco, complementing a light and bright perfectly presented interior, this fabulous family home is the complete lifestyle package.
The family feel right at home in the generous interior introducing four bedrooms, two bathrooms, a rumpus room and an expansive casual living zone. Wrapping around a kitchen featuring walk in pantry and quality stainless steel appliances set in an abundance of storage solutions and preparation spaces, it opens to the decked in a seamless blend of indoor outdoor enjoyment.
The main bedroom featuring an ensuite and walk in robe is cleverly zoned from the remaining bedrooms and the family bathroom, tucked away in their own "wing" accessed off the living zone.
In a location with all the lifestyle benefits of acres of parklands nearby, it is central to Epping Plaza and station, South Morang station and Westfield.
Heading the long list of desired extras is ducted heating and cooling engineered timber floors, quality carpets, a double garage and gated laneway access for parking the caravan, trailer or boat.
Insights: 16 Lichen Way, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2017 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Rare Opportunity In Sought After Location
Located in one of the most sought after streets in Epping, this property ticks all the boxes for first home buyers, investors and down sizers. It is walking distance to Westfield Shopping Centre, (currently undergoing extensive redevelopment), South Morang Train station and schools.
This delightfully presented home comprises 3 bedrooms with walk in robes, master bedroom with ensuite, beautifully presented central bathroom, timber kitchen which overlooks a living area with quality parquetry floors. Further features include ducted heating, wood fire place, evaporative cooling and a remote single car garage with internal and external access.
Outside you will find a compact back yard with a covered outdoor entertaining area which overlooks a low maintenance and well-presented garden area and at the front of the dwelling your eyes will be caught by a beautiful garden area which appears slightly above the white picket fence.
Homes in this street dont come up for sale very often and in the current market climate this one wont last long.
In Room Auction: Thurs 23rd November @ 7pm (unless sold prior)
Venue: 769 High Street, Epping
Insights: 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Location (792m2 Allotment)
In the heart of this expanding suburb is a rare jewel in the crown, located only minutes from Epping Plaza, Northern Hospital, Epping Train Station, numerous primary and secondary schools & a host of other facilities.
Comprising 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, double garage, formal lounge, nicely landscaped gardens & a generous size parcel of land totalling 792m2.
Offers scope for renovating, extending or developing (STCA). Located In a highly desirable pocket of Epping, this home will be one to treasure for years to come.
Insights: 25 Young Street, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2017 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.
